nodes.text: Team Four was a squad that served within the Separatist Droid Army of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic in 19 BBY. It was stationed on the planet Mokivj, where it patrolled the local droid factory and cortosis mine.

Team Four was tasked by Serennian Duke Solha with investigating the Separatist freighter Larkrer, which was secretly being used by Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker in order to find his wife, the Republic Senator Padmé Amidala, on the planet, where he was accompanied by the Chiss Senior Captain Thrawn and the astromech droid R2-D2. At the facility, Skywalker heard a group of B1-series battle droids approaching his location, which he believed to be the Team Four that Solha spoke of.
Team Four was mentioned in the 2018 novel Thrawn: Alliances, the second installment of the Star Wars: Thrawn trilogy written by Timothy Zahn.
